message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a limited time at the price of $13,000. This product is highly sought after and I'm confident it will meet your needs.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
